context: Insurance company expanding cyber liability product line to address growing demand for ransomware and data breach coverage

request.purpose: Develop comprehensive cyber liability insurance product including ransomware coverage, data breach response, and regulatory fines protection
request.justification: Cyber incidents increased 300% in past 2 years, market demand growing rapidly

decision_process.outcome: Identified market gap and pricing strategy

business_impact.expected_outcome: Capture 5% market share in cyber insurance, $50M premium growth in first year

lessons_learned: Cross-functional collaboration essential for complex insurance products, early regulatory engagement reduces launch delays
